features.title: Voting up & down
features.desc: Registered user can vote up and down on both question and answers

features.title: Flag and moderate
features.desc: Hold new posts for moderation and allow community to flag posts

features.title: Private question & answer
features.desc: User can ask private posts which are only visible to user level above moderator

features.title: Best answer
features.desc: Original poster or admin can select a best answer for a question.

features.title: Comments on question and answer
features.desc: Registered user can comments on both question an answer

features.title: User profile
features.desc: Frontend profile management and users activities, status and notifications
